page.title: 08Recreation in Brafferton
page.content:
One of the main events in Brafferton is the annual{Summer Fete. This is held on a Sunday at the end of June.
The main events of the day include a{Fancy Dress competition}for children in two age ranges: those under 5 and those between 6 and 10 years of age.
This is followed by{Sports}which take place on the grass at the top end of the village.
Inside the Village Hall is the children's{Painting Competition.}The pictures, drawings or paintings, can be of any size and any medium.
There are many stalls and you can even guess the weight of a sheep as well as buy teas, hot dogs and ices.
